Redesigned Blog

By Dan Bradshaw October 15, 2017

So I’ve left my website untouched for quite some time. These last few years have been busy! Hopefully I’ll get round to posting more regular entries, and keeping track the things I come across daily. I’ve already got one post in progress, so that’s a start!

That’s all for now, see you in the next one!
